tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TEST HEAVY
comments: Super Hard! I\'m positive I am failing this class. The class average for our Midterm was a failing mark and she did not bell curve it. The textbooks were very expensive and were pretty useless because her lecture slides are composed of the textbook content. AVOID taking this class.. I wish I went with another option

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: BEST accounting professor at William Paterson. Teaches everything even topics from past accounting courses that other professors taught poorly. She tells you exactly what is on the test. All you have to do it show up and pay attention. I do not know why her rating on here is so poor. She is an outstanding professor.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Do not take!!! Worst professor I have ever had or heard in my life. She is very hard to understand, does not help if asked, her pp give no help to understand chapter. Most of my class failed most test and had a huge problem with her as well. I am not saying this out of spite passed her class, but I would definitely suggest not to take her.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER
comments: She was an average professor but not good for an accounting class. If you really pay attention and not get bored easily you\'ll get an A or B. She drops the lowest test grade and curves a little but only if the class really needs it. If you\'re an accounting major and you want to work hard then pick her.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Avoid taking her class her if you can. She doesn\'t give you your test back to review so you won\'t be able to tell if she was really fair grading your paper. I remember she gave the class a question to study before the exam and I answered the question exactly the way she answered it in it and she gave me a zero for that question...

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: She is extremely hard. But you will learn a lot in her class.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Had her last semester and she was a tough teacher. Explains the matterial well but she is very serious when it comes to exams.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: She uses powerpoint slides to explain the concepts and not the book so if you normally rely on books to learn you will be in trouble. With her curve you can get atleast a C but the class is really hard.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Tough grader.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Avoid, avoid, avoid... she is the most difficult professor in the accounting department. She doesn\'t assign HWs and doesn\'t use the book either. She relies on ppt slids to explain the material but the exams are nothing like what she teaches in class. Her problems are exrtemly DIFFECULT. Her multiple choice are impossible to pass. So good luck!!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: DONT TAKE HER! she cant teach and her multiple choice questions on the exam are confusing...just don\'t take her IT\'S VERY HARD TO GET AN A!!!!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: She is very tricky. She makes you bust your ass off studying for her exams and then surprises you with materials she never went over in class!! She will cause you a great deal of stress from the beginning of the semester untill the final exam.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: nice lady, hard course, i think she is one of the best accounting teachers at william paterson. instead of just reading off the powerpoint like most teachers she actually takes the time to go over problems in class. however this is still a hard class so you need to practice the problems

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: She became VERY hard on her students after she became 10 yrs in service. I had her for the midterms and final and got 28 and 53! the average grade was around 50. she is not easy anymore.If you take her, you may think you done well in her exam but when you see your grade, you will be VERY shocked. Avoid her at any cost if you want to rescue your GPA

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: She just recently became ten-year and she literally turn into a monster immediately after. Had two finals as is usual in her class, tried to trick us on both,ould not answer any questions prior to the exam ( like a week b4) about the material. Ive had her once b4 for Fincl Acct and she was must nicer, this time around she was mean!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: TAKE HER!!! she is very helpful and sweet lady. Have accent but you will get used to it after a while. Gives quiz every other class but they are not difficult. 2 exams and 1 final, she drops one exam. As long as you pay attention to her class, you will get an A in class. She also grades fair. Learned alot in her class!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: easy proffesor. she explains the materials very well. 3 exams 1 is dropped. she grades hard. final is impossible to pass lol.. ay i got a B+. TAKE HER!!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: She is the easiest Accounting professor. She goes over the material well and thoroughly. You know what will be on the tests. Also, if you do well on the first 2 exams, you don\'t need to take the final!!!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: i had her for 212 and 420. the best professor i had. wish she would teach 430.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Nice teacher, its sometimes hard to understand her accent sometimes, but tries to make class interesting. She gives help if needed, and not to much work. 2 midterms 1 final and drops the lowest grade.
